class BaseFunction[source]

BaseFunction() :: ABC

Base class of a PCT function.

class Integration[source]

Integration(gain, slow) :: BaseFunction

Integration function.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
integrator = Integration(3, 10)
output = integrator(5)
print(output)

1.5
